titles.title: Recognizing the 19th annual "Zora Neale Hurston Festival of the Arts and Humanities" which will be held from January 26, 2008, to February 3, 2008.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 1/29/2008--Introduced. Recognizes the 19th annual "Zora Neale Hurston Festival of the Arts and Humanities" which shall be held from January 26-February 3, 2008.
